Orage

Science-Fantasy Tactical

Orage is a pixel-art science-fantasy tactical, set in the universe of Steredenn.

Art by Simon Coroller, the pixel-artist of Steredenn.

The world has been ravaged and destroyed by a cataclysmic and mysterious force. And well, that’s about it.

This project has been discontinued on 29 nov. 2016.
